user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send a thoughtful response to me (oakwoodteachers@school.com) regarding the accommodations for our students, and remind her to check her Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Care Log for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Student Accommodations

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send a thoughtful update to oakwoodteachers@school.com regarding the current and upcoming accommodations for our students? Your insight is invaluable as we finalize support plans.

For reference, please be sure to review any recent messages in your Gmail account as well as the latest notes in your Care Log before responding. This will help ensure we have the most accurate and complete information.

Thank you for your time and continued collaboration.

Warm regards,

Oakwood Teaching Alliance

final_output:
